title: 菜单开启怎么弄开启声音
author: ＜光速＞
txt_content: 菜单开启怎么弄开启声音

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
例如是  BLOCK_GRASS_FALL的话就是

open-action: 'sound: block grass fall, 2.0, 0.5'



新手帮助.yml

2020-1-12 16:17 上传

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 你用的什么菜单插件

replies.author: ＜光速＞
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-12 09:21
你用的什么菜单插件
cc菜单

replies.author: 晴天娃娃_
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mine_永恒 于 2020-1-12 09:30 编辑 

open-action: 'say 1'
这是打开菜单时执行的操作，比如例子里填的是 say 1 效果就是打开菜单时会执行这个指令。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
＜光速＞ 发表于 2020-1-12 09:22
cc菜单
menu-settings 下面添加

open-action: 'sound: BLOCK_GRASS_FALL;'

声音列表见 https://bukkit.windit.net/javadoc/org/bukkit/Sound.html

replies.author: ＜光速＞
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-12 09:26
menu-settings 下面添加

open-action: 'sound: BLOCK_GRASS_FALL;'
